events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it arrived the wrong size. I would like to return it and get a refund.
The customer's case has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to their request for a return and money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for resolution regarding the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your return and refund process for the jacket you received.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket was unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 789456123. The jacket is still unused and in the original packaging, just the wrong size.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your return and process a full refund once the jacket is received at our warehouse.
That sounds great, thanks for your prompt help. I will send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should reflect in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if you need any further assistance from us.
The case has been closed following confirmation of refund receipt and no further requests from the customer.
